title: What to Watch: Four Movies and Series to Stream This Week
sub_head: From Netflix’s ‘The Harder They Fall,’ a western about Black cowboys, to the Apple TV+ movie ‘Finch,’ featuring Tom Hanks after the apocalypse
body:
In the dramas streaming this week, Idris Elba is being hunted in the old American West and Tom Hanks is trying to survive the apocalypse. Also, Judge Judy is back. Here’s where to find them:
(Netflix)
